COMMAND.NAME: positiontolineoffset
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.

DESCRIPTION.P: Given a character position within bufferName this will return the line number that contains that position and the offset into the line of that position.
NOTE:if position is out of range, it will be set to the nearest legal position.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
